程序包 com.goldsprite.gdengine.screens

类 GScreen

java.lang.Object
com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
com.goldsprite.gdengine.screens.GScreen
所有已实现的接口:
com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
直接已知子类:
EditorGameScreen, ExampleGScreen, GameRunnerScreen, GDEngineHubScreen
public abstract class GScreen extends com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
创建:
- 设置视口, 重写该方法: initViewport(){ setViewport(...) }
- 添加事件处理器: getImp().addInputProcessor(...)
